data.title: William Gray Jr. Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: Bill Gray is survived by his loving wife of 48 years, Katie. His daughters Lila (Robert) and Charni, his son Billy, and grandsons Colin & Brennan. He passed away peacefully at h...
data.text:
Bill Gray is survived by his loving wife of 48 years, Katie. His daughters Lila (Robert) and Charni, his son Billy, and grandsons Colin & Brennan. He passed away peacefully at home with his family by his side. He will be remembered for his calming, friendly and hilarious personality. He grew up in Squirrel Hill and went to Shady Side Academy. Bill received his Bachelor's Degree from The University of Pittsburgh and his Master's Degree from Ohio University. He loved to tell and write stories and poetry, tend to his Bonsai Trees, and take photographs. He will forever remain in the hearts and thoughts of everyone who was lucky enough to know him.

William K. Gray, Jr.

May 26, 1945 - August 1, 2023
